long_description: The Camp Time Roll-A-Cot is a natural for camp and cabin, or as a spare bed at home. Tough 1000-denier polyester mesh provides breathable comfort for a good night's sleep. Fabric tension is easily adjusted with a twist of the wing nut. Strong tubular aluminum alloy frame has the strength of steel at 1/3 the weight. Convenient carry bag attaches to cot frame to double as a night storage pouch.
short_description: The Camp Time Roll-A-Cot is a natural for camp and cabin, or as a spare bed at home.
